nodes.text: The Kessel Correctional Facility was an Imperial garrison located on Kessel's moon.

The base was constructed into the moon itself. It had a large docking bay and a powerful communications tower, which were the only major landmarks visible on the surface. There were four upper levels which housed the docking bay, processing center, and temporary slave pens. Located five levels down were the command deck, officer's quarters, troop barracks and trustee quarters. It was destroyed when the Death Star prototype fired at the moon.
